headline: Buffett’s $9.7B OxyChem Acquisition — Why Investing Experts Say It’s Genius
summary: Lean how Berkshire Hathaway’s $9.7B OxyChem acquisition boosts cash flow, strengthens Occidental and reflects Warren Buffett’s value investing strategy.
